coreAttributes.name: Reppu
coreAttributes.description:
An absurdly large and heavy experimental driveblade made much more maneuverable by the forces of the arcane at massive cost. Used by a mad prince who had the intentions of slaying a god with fire.
Non enim te prohibere ad me respice te Titanas
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Load a flame cartridge into the Reppu and obliterate [npc2.Name].
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(fasten)] the Reppu across [npc.her] back, With the safety on for later use.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the Reppu from [npc.her] back, [npc.verb(unload)] it's active cartridge and [npc.verb(store)] it for later.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(cock)] [npc.her] blade before sweeping out at [npc2.name], coating the ethereal blade in fire before passing through [npc2.her] body, a loud metalic pop rings through the air as the blade's cartridge auto ejects.

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] driveblade down at [npc2.Name] sending the blade and its gout of fire through them vertically and punging into the ground, the blades cartridge ejects itself to the floor.
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(thrust)] your ethereal blade through [npc2.name] leaving flames in your wake. As [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the blade from [npc2.name], it loudly ejects it's cartridge.

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(cock)] [npc.her] blade before sweeping out at [npc2.name], coating the ethereal blade in fire before missing [npc2.Name] completely. The blade's cartridge, expended, ejects anyways.

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] driveblade down at [npc.Name] but narrowly misses, pluging the tip of the blade into the ground. The blade's cartridge ejects next to it anyways. Mocking [npc.Name].
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(thrust)] [npc.her] sword at [npc2.name], but loses [npc.her] balance falling well short of [npc.her] target, [Npc2.name]. The blade sounds off, ejecting it's spent cartridge.
